content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 1) and a furnace at position(0, 2)

### Copper cable factory at position(1, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Assembling machine at position(1, 1) and inserter at position(1, 2) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 1, 3) that connects the furnace at position(0, 2) to assembling machine at position(1, 1)

### Electronic circuit factory at position(1, 4)
Consists of following entities
- Assembling machine at position(1, 5) and inserter at position(1, 6) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 1, 7) that connects the copper cable factory at position(1, 0) to assembling machine at position(1, 5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors related to crafting requirements
- Always check the required materials for crafting before starting the process to ensure you have enough resources available.
